LanguageData._canThrumboMilkBeCheese_title: Can Thrumbo milk be made into cheese?
LanguageData._canThrumboMilkBeCheese_desc: Can Thrumbo milk be made into cheese? (Requires Vanilla Cooking Extended)
LanguageData._canThrumbosGrowWool_desc: Can Thrumbos grow wool? Will allow Thrumbos to be shaved for their wool like other animals.
LanguageData._canAmbrosiaBeGrown_desc: Can ambrosia be grown? Unless set otherwise, ambrosia can only be grown in hydroponics and after completing the ambrosia research.
LanguageData._doesAmbrosiaNeedToBeResearched_title: Does ambrosia need research to grow?
LanguageData._doesAmbrosiaNeedToBeResearched_desc: Does ambrosia need research to grow? If this is set to false the research will be removed and won't be needed to grow ambrosia.
LanguageData._doesAmbrosiaNeedHydroponics_title: Does ambrosia need hydroponics to grow?
LanguageData._doesAmbrosiaNeedHydroponics_desc: Does ambrosia need hydroponics to grow? If false ambrosia can also be grown on the ground.
LanguageData._reqAmbrosiaGrowLevel_title: The Plants level needed to grow ambrosia
LanguageData._reqAmbrosiaGrowLevel_desc: The Plants level your pawn will need to grow ambrosia.
